mapper.sql: /* commonSearchColumns */ "no" AS "no", "title" AS "title", "important" AS "important", "classification" AS "classification", "use_yn" AS "useYn", "content" AS "content", "file_name" as "fileName", "file_path" as "filePath", file_size as fileSize, "start_date" as "startDate", "end_date" as "endDate", "created" AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' AS "created", "lastmodified" AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' AS "lastModified"

/* procSearchDateUser */
AND use_yn = 'Y'
AND to_date(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS') >= to_date(to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS')
AND to_date(to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS') >= to_date(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.MS')
mapper.select:
SELECT
no, classification, title, start_date AS "startDate", end_date AS "endDate", use_yn AS "useYn", important AS "important", file_name as "fileName", file_size as "fileSize", file_path as "filePath",
(SELECT value FROM code_detail WHERE key = classification AND group_id = 'SUPPORT_NOTICE') as classificationValue
FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY created DESC
LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT , (SELECT value FROM code_detail WHERE key = classification AND group_id = 'SUPPORT_NOTICE') as classificationValue
FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (title, important, classification, use_yn, content, file_name, file_path, file_size, start_date, end_date, created, lastmodified) values( #{title}, #{important}, #{classification}, #{useYn}, #{content}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, now(), now() );
mapper.update:

"title" = #{title},
important = #{important},
classification = #{classification},
use_yn = #{useYn},
content = #{content},
file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_size = #{fileSize},
